title: Excerpt From Pranab’s Book Shared... Except He’s Yet to Write it
subtitle: Postcard news shared a fake excerpt on 13 June,allegedly from Mukherjee’s book. When his office was contacted, they said “The book ends when he became the President. So where does the question of something in May 2015 arise?”
author: www.thequint.com
vclaim:
In fact, it is yet to be penned down by the author. Former president Mukherjee’s earlier books covered the time period before his presidency. Postcard News has shared a fake passage which is from the period that has not yet been written about by the former president and will be covered in his new book, “The Presidential Years”.

Even though it is clear that the passage shared by Postcard News is patently fake, Alt News also reached out to former President Mukherjee’s office to check if this was an excerpt from his books.
